contribution_desc:
This multimedia paper proposes a multimedia capturing system for university lectures consisting of multiple devices such as cameras, microphones, projectors.

Contribution: "ubicomp" -> "automated capture and access"
devices_included: Camera; Microphone; Whiteboard; Projector; Laptop; TV; Tablet; Environment sensors
device_mount: Mounted to wall; Placed loosely around user (e.g., table)
